purpose: The email announces the workshops that will be held in conjunction with the ER 2025 conference, highlighting their role as a collaborative forum for innovative ideas in conceptual modeling. It provides links to the respective workshops and details about the Call for Papers, including submission deadlines and notification dates. The email also lists the workshop chairs for any inquiries.

evidence_sentences: Continuing a long tradition, ER 2025 will host workshops to be held in conjunction with the main conference.
These workshops serve as an intensive collaborative forum for exchanging innovative ideas about conceptual modeling, and for discovering new frontiers for its use.
Details regarding the Call for Papers for each workshop can be found on the respective workshop's website (linked below):
Common deadlines in all the five workshops are: Submission Deadline: *27 June 2025* Notification:* 28 July 2025*
